channel.title: Need help with monsterdrops
channel.description:
ok iv folowed the tuts and it all compiles but when i kill that monster i dont get the drop i set. :S
[code]npcdrop = 1125 3 4153 1 3 995 10000 npcdrop = 2028 0 995 100000 npcdrop = 2027 0 995 100000 npcdrop = 2026 0 995 100000 npcdrop = 2025 0 995 100000 npcdrop = 2029 0 995 100000 npcdrop = 2030 0 995 100000 npcdrop = 1615 0 4151 1[/code]
thats my npcdrop.cfg and it looks allright to me but i could be rong. could some one check it for me.
also - if anyone knows how to change shop prices so eg. rares like phats are 50m instead of 100gp could you tell me.
ty - devil

i have same prob i use cheez 78 and to set shop prices look in item.cfg and change the first codes for it
